Name: Spade
info: Clean The Area,you are planting;loosen & turn the soil over

Name: Soil
info: Add additional soil;preferable organic soil to your garden,it make richer soil

Name: Seed
info: Carefully plant your seeds or plant start imto soil

Name: Watering
info: Plants need the right amount of water--not too much or too lottle.wait untile the soil is dry to water

Name: Sun And Light
info: Grow your plants in a location so they get the sunLight they need

Name: Pesticides
info: Controlling garden pests is important but only use an organic pest

Name: Mulching
info: Add mulch to the soil To improve soil moisture fertility and health of soil

Name: Harvest
info: Harvest your fruits & veggies is exiting for your family & especially your kids

Name: Tool
info: This is very necessary for gardening & for complete all above the work.
